entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -20.9°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -24.7°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
